games.name: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
games.description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is a turn-based RPG set in a dark fantasy world inspired by Belle Époque France. Players lead Expedition 33 on a desperate mission to stop the Artífice, a mysterious entity that annually paints a number—marking all people of that age for death. With a gripping narrative, strategic combat blending real-time mechanics, and stunning visuals, the game delivers an emotional journey of hope, loss, and defiance against fate.

games.name: Silent Hill 2
games.description: Silent Hill 2 is a psychological horror game that follows James Sunderland as he searches for his deceased wife in the eerie town of Silent Hill. Drawn by a mysterious letter, James encounters disturbing creatures, unsettling characters, and his own haunting past. With its deep symbolism, emotional storytelling, and atmospheric tension, Silent Hill 2 is widely regarded as one of the greatest horror games ever made.

games.name: Call of Duty Modern Warfare III
games.description: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III (2023) is a first-person shooter developed by Sledgehammer Games and published by Activision. As the third entry in the rebooted Modern Warfare sub-series, the game follows Task Force 141 in their pursuit of Vladimir Makarov, a Russian ultranationalist threatening global war. Featuring intense single-player missions, remastered multiplayer maps, and an open-world Zombies mode, Modern Warfare III delivers high-stakes action and strategic combat.

games.name: Call of Duty Black Ops 6
games.description: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III (2023) is a first-person shooter developed by Sledgehammer Games and published by Activision. As the third entry in the rebooted Modern Warfare sub-series, the game follows Task Force 141 in their pursuit of Vladimir Makarov, a Russian ultranationalist threatening global war. Featuring intense single-player missions, remastered multiplayer maps, and an open-world Zombies mode, Modern Warfare III delivers high-stakes action and strategic combat.

games.name: Bloodborne
games.description: Bloodborne is a dark fantasy action RPG developed by FromSoftware and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. Set in the Gothic city of Yharnam, players take on the role of a Hunter seeking the source of a mysterious blood-borne disease that has transformed the city's inhabitants into monstrous creatures. With fast-paced combat, intricate world design, and Lovecraftian horror elements, Bloodborne is praised for its challenging gameplay and deep lore.

games.name: Tunic
games.description: Tunic is an action-adventure game where players control a small fox exploring a mysterious, ruined world. With an isometric perspective, challenging combat, and cryptic storytelling, the game encourages discovery through hidden pathways, puzzles, and an in-game manual written in an unknown language. Inspired by classic adventure titles, Tunic blends exploration, mystery, and strategic combat into a visually stunning experience.

games.name: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world action RPG developed by CD Projekt Red. Set in the dystopian metropolis of Night City, players take on the role of V, a mercenary navigating a world of cybernetic enhancements, corporate intrigue, and underground factions. With branching narratives, deep customization, and intense combat, Cyberpunk 2077 offers a gripping experience where choices shape the future.

games.name: Elden Ring
games.description: Elden Ring is an action RPG developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. Set in the vast open world of the Lands Between, players take on the role of a Tarnished, seeking to restore the shattered Elden Ring and become the Elden Lord. With deep lore, challenging combat, and expansive exploration, Elden Ring offers a rich and immersive experience.

games.name: The Last of Us Part II Remastered
games.description: The Last of Us Part II Remastered is a third-person action-adventure survival horror game developed by Naughty Dog and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. This enhanced version of the 2020 title features improved visuals, faster loading times, and new gameplay modes, including the roguelike survival experience 'No Return.' Players follow Ellie and Abby through a gripping narrative of revenge, trauma, and redemption in a post-apocalyptic world.

games.name: Outer Wilds
games.description: Outer Wilds is an open-world mystery adventure developed by Mobius Digital and published by Annapurna Interactive. Players take on the role of a space explorer investigating a solar system trapped in a 22-minute time loop. As they uncover ancient Nomai ruins and piece together cosmic secrets, they must navigate dynamic environments that change over time. With deep exploration, clever puzzles, and a unique storytelling approach, Outer Wilds offers a thought-provoking journey through space and time.

games.name: METAL GEAR SOLID Δ: SNAKE EATER
games.description: METAL GEAR SOLID Δ: SNAKE EATER is a remake of the 2004 classic, Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater, developed and published by Konami. This reimagined version retains the gripping Cold War-era story while introducing enhanced graphics, 3D audio, and modern gameplay refinements. Players step into the boots of Naked Snake as he embarks on a mission to rescue a defecting scientist, sabotage a nuclear-equipped superweapon, and confront his legendary mentor, The Boss. With stealth-focused mechanics and immersive jungle survival elements, this remake delivers the ultimate tactical espionage action experience.

games.name: Hollow Knight: Silksong
games.description: Hollow Knight: Silksong is the highly anticipated sequel to Hollow Knight, developed and published by Team Cherry. Players take on the role of Hornet, princess-protector of Hallownest, as she embarks on a perilous journey through the mysterious kingdom of Pharloom. With fluid combat, intricate platforming, and a hauntingly beautiful world, Silksong expands upon its predecessor with new mechanics, enemies, and an immersive orchestral soundtrack.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto VI
games.description: Grand Theft Auto VI is an upcoming open-world action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games. Set in the fictional U.S. state of Leonida, inspired by Florida, the game follows Jason Duval and Lucia Caminos as they navigate the criminal underworld of Vice City. After a failed heist, they find themselves entangled in a vast conspiracy, forced to rely on each other to survive. With cutting-edge visuals, an expansive world, and deep storytelling, GTA VI promises to redefine the open-world experience.

games.name: Dead Space (2023)
games.description: Dead Space (2023) is a survival horror game developed by Motive Studio and published by Electronic Arts. A remake of the 2008 classic, the game follows engineer Isaac Clarke as he navigates the USG Ishimura, a mining spaceship overrun by terrifying Necromorphs. With enhanced graphics, immersive audio, and refined gameplay mechanics, this remake delivers a deeply atmospheric and intense horror experience.

games.name: Red Dead Redemption II
games.description: Red Dead Redemption II is an open-world action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games. Set in 1899, players follow Arthur Morgan, an outlaw and member of the Van der Linde gang, as he navigates the decline of the Wild West. With a vast, immersive world, deep storytelling, and realistic mechanics, the game offers an unforgettable journey through the American frontier.

games.name: Assetto Corsa
games.description: Assetto Corsa is a sim racing game developed by Kunos Simulazioni and published by 505 Games. Designed for realism, the game features laser-scanned tracks, advanced physics, and extensive customization options. With a wide selection of cars, detailed driving mechanics, and support for modding, Assetto Corsa is a benchmark in racing simulation.

games.name: EA SPORTS FC 25
games.description: EA SPORTS FC 25 is the latest installment in EA's football simulation series, developed and published by Electronic Arts. Featuring enhanced gameplay mechanics, smarter AI, and new tactical systems like FC IQ, the game offers a more immersive football experience. Players can compete in over 30 licensed leagues, including the UEFA Champions League, Premier League, and Bundesliga, with more than 19,000 real-world athletes. The new 5v5 Rush mode introduces fast-paced matches, replacing VOLTA, while Career Mode and Ultimate Team receive major updates.

games.name: F1 25
games.description: F1 25 is the latest installment in the official Formula 1 racing series, developed by Codemasters and published by EA Sports. Featuring enhanced physics, realistic LiDAR-scanned circuits, and the return of the Braking Point story mode, the game offers an immersive experience for both casual and competitive players. With updated teams, cars, and dynamic weather effects, F1 25 delivers the most authentic F1 simulation yet.

games.name: Cities: Skylines
games.description: Cities: Skylines is a city-building simulation game developed by Colossal Order and published by Paradox Interactive. Players take on the role of a mayor, managing zoning, infrastructure, taxation, and public services to create and maintain a thriving metropolis. With deep simulation mechanics, extensive modding support, and a vast array of expansions, Cities: Skylines offers a highly detailed and customizable urban planning experience.

games.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.description: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is an open-world action RPG developed and published by CD Projekt Red. Players take on the role of Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter navigating a war-torn world in search of his adopted daughter, Ciri, who is pursued by the spectral Wild Hunt. With deep storytelling, dynamic combat, and a richly detailed world inspired by Slavic mythology, The Witcher 3 is widely regarded as one of the greatest RPGs of all time.

games.name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare (2019)
games.description: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare (2019) is a first-person shooter developed by Infinity Ward and published by Activision. Serving as a reboot of the Modern Warfare sub-series, the game features a gripping campaign where players join CIA operatives and British SAS forces to combat Russian invaders and terrorist factions. With realistic combat mechanics, cross-platform multiplayer, and the introduction of Warzone battle royale, Modern Warfare delivers intense action and tactical gameplay.

games.name: Dark Souls Remastered
games.description: Dark Souls Remastered is an enhanced version of the critically acclaimed action RPG developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. Players return to the dark and immersive world of Lordran, facing relentless enemies, intricate level design, and deep lore. With improved graphics, smoother performance, and expanded online features, this remaster preserves the challenge and atmosphere of the original while refining the experience for modern platforms.

games.name: Demon's Souls
games.description: Demon's Souls Remake is a reimagining of the 2009 classic, developed by Bluepoint Games and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. Set in the cursed kingdom of Boletaria, players take on the role of a lone warrior battling nightmarish creatures and powerful demons. With stunning visuals, refined mechanics, and immersive sound design, this remake preserves the brutal challenge and deep lore of the original while enhancing the experience for modern audiences.

games.name: Animal Well
games.description: Animal Well is a Metroidvania puzzle-platformer developed by Billy Basso as Shared Memory and published by Bigmode. Players control an unnamed blob creature exploring an underground labyrinth filled with mysterious animals, nonlinear platforming, and intricate puzzles. With atmospheric pixel art, unconventional upgrades, and deep secrets, Animal Well offers a unique and immersive experience.

games.name: Portal 2
games.description: Portal 2 is a puzzle-platformer developed and published by Valve. Players take on the role of Chell as she navigates the Aperture Science Enrichment Center, solving physics-based puzzles using the portal gun. The game introduces new mechanics like light bridges, gels, and tractor beams, along with a cooperative mode featuring the robots ATLAS and P-Body. With witty dialogue, engaging puzzles, and a deep narrative, Portal 2 is widely regarded as one of the greatest puzzle games of all time.

games.name: Resident Evil 2
games.description: Resident Evil 2 (2019) is a survival horror game developed and published by Capcom. A remake of the 1998 classic, the game follows rookie police officer Leon S. Kennedy and college student Claire Redfield as they attempt to escape Raccoon City during a zombie outbreak. With modernized gameplay, enhanced visuals, and an over-the-shoulder camera perspective, this reimagining delivers intense horror and immersive storytelling.

games.name: Resident Evil 4
games.description: Resident Evil 4 (2023) is a survival horror game developed and published by Capcom. A remake of the 2005 classic, the game follows U.S. agent Leon S. Kennedy as he embarks on a mission to rescue the president's kidnapped daughter from a sinister cult in rural Spain. With modernized gameplay, enhanced visuals, and expanded story elements, this reimagining delivers intense action, strategic combat, and immersive horror.

games.name: Sons of the Forest
games.description: Sons of the Forest is a survival horror game developed by Endnight Games and published by Newnight. Serving as the sequel to The Forest, the game follows a protagonist sent to a mysterious island to search for a missing billionaire and his family. Players must craft, build, and survive against cannibalistic creatures while uncovering ancient secrets buried deep underground. With a vast open world, dynamic seasons, and cooperative multiplayer, Sons of the Forest delivers an intense and immersive survival experience.

games.name: Persona 3 Reload
games.description: Persona 3 Reload is a remake of the 2006 classic RPG developed by Atlus and published by Sega. Players take on the role of a high school student who gains the ability to summon Personas and joins the Specialized Extracurricular Execution Squad (S.E.E.S.) to battle mysterious creatures known as Shadows. With modernized visuals, refined gameplay, and expanded story elements, Reload brings the beloved Persona 3 experience to a new generation.

games.name: Alan Wake 2
games.description: Alan Wake 2 is a survival horror game developed by Remedy Entertainment and published by Epic Games Publishing. The sequel to Alan Wake (2010), the game follows best-selling novelist Alan Wake, who has been trapped in an alternate dimension for 13 years, as he attempts to escape by writing a horror story involving FBI Special Agent Saga Anderson. With psychological horror elements, deep storytelling, and immersive gameplay, Alan Wake 2 delivers a thrilling experience.

games.name: The Witcher 4
games.description: The Witcher 4 is an upcoming open-world RPG developed by CD Projekt Red and published by CD Projekt. Set after the events of The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, the game follows Ciri as the new protagonist, navigating a brutal dark-fantasy world filled with monsters, magic, and political intrigue. With a new REDengine 5-powered world, expanded combat mechanics, and deep storytelling, The Witcher 4 marks the beginning of a new trilogy in the franchise.

games.name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
games.description: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl is a first-person shooter with survival horror elements, developed and published by GSC Game World. Set in the post-apocalyptic exclusion zone of Chernobyl, players take on the role of Yevhen 'Skif' Martynenko, a veteran of the Ukrainian Marine Corps, as he uncovers the mysteries of the Zone. With dynamic survival mechanics, deep exploration, and a non-linear story, the game offers an immersive and atmospheric experience.

games.name: Enigma of Fear
games.description: Enigma of Fear is an investigation and mystery game developed by Dumativa and Cellbit. Players take on the role of Mia, a paranormal detective searching for her missing father inside the Perimeter—a place that doesn't exist. With a mix of pixel art and 3D environments, players must analyze clues, solve puzzles, and face terrifying creatures while unraveling the secrets behind the Cult of Fear.
